mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_merge_rela (merge_id, task_id, old_cust_no, new_cust_no, merge_type, merge_time, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{mergeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mergeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysDate, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_merge_rela set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_cust_no = #{oldCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_cust_no = #{newCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merge_type = #{mergeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merge_time = sysDate, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where merge_id = #{mergeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select merge_id, task_id, old_cust_no, new_cust_no, merge_type, merge_time, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_merge_rela where merge_id = #{mergeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select merge_id, task_id, old_cust_no, new_cust_no, merge_type, merge_time, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_merge_rela

select merge_id, task_id, old_cust_no, new_cust_no, merge_type, merge_time, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_merge_rela where 1=1
and task_id=#{taskId}
